resourceTemplates.name: Latest exchange rates
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve the most recent working day's reference exchange rates. Optional `base` parameter overrides the default (EUR). Optional `symbols` limits the response to specific target currencies.

resourceTemplates.name: Historical rates by date
resourceTemplates.description: Get reference exchange rates for the specified calendar date (format YYYY-MM-DD). Optional `base` and `symbols` query parameters are supported.

resourceTemplates.name: Time-series rates (startâ€“end)
resourceTemplates.description: Fetch daily reference exchange rates for every working day between `startDate` and `endDate` (inclusive). Optional `base` and `symbols` query parameters are supported.

resourceTemplates.name: Time-series rates to present
resourceTemplates.description: Fetch daily reference exchange rates from `startDate` up to the latest available date. Optional `symbols` query parameter filters the returned currencies.
